signature: public int translate(final CharSequence input, final int index, final Writer writer) throws IOException
name: translate
javadoc:
/**
 * Translates a Unicode escape sequence in the provided input at the specified index.
 *
 * If the character at the specified index is a backslash followed by 'u', this method will consume any additional 'u' characters,
 * then attempt to parse 4 hexadecimal digits following the '+' character (if present) as a Unicode code point. The parsed code point
 * is written to the provided writer.
 *
 * @param input the CharSequence containing the Unicode escape sequence
 * @param index the index in the input where the Unicode escape sequence starts
 * @param writer the Writer to which the translated Unicode code point will be written
 * @return the number of characters consumed from the input, or 0 if no Unicode escape sequence was found
 * @throws IOException if an I/O error occurs while writing to the provided writer
 * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the Unicode escape sequence is invalid (e.g. less than 4 hexadecimal digits)
 */
